### 1. Source data
```{r source, warning = TRUE, results = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library (tidyverse)
   library (janitor) 

   bob_ross_raw <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-08-06/bob-ross.csv") %>%
      clean_names () 
```
   
   
### 2a. Create list of teams in the 2019 world cup sorted by games played
```{r transform, message = F}

   library (tidytext)

   bob_ross <- bob_ross_raw %>%
      select (episode, title) %>%
      #select(-contains('frame')) %>%
      #gather("object","count", aurora_borealis:winter) %>%
      unnest_tokens(word, title) %>%
      count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%
      mutate(angle = 90 * sample(c(0, 1), n(), replace = TRUE, prob = c(60, 40))) %>%
      slice (1:60)
```


### 3. Transform game outcomes data
```{r transform2, message = F}
 
   library (ggwordcloud)  #https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggwordcloud/vignettes/ggwordcloud.html

   set.seed(42)
   ggplot(bob_ross, aes(label = word, size = n, angle = angle)) +
      geom_text_wordcloud_area(
         area_corr_power = 1,
         rm_outside = TRUE
         ) +
      scale_size_area (max_size = 16) +
      theme_minimal()
```
